title: Bug 4329: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: When searching via Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
OB: No results are displayed when searching via Package view selection and dialog.
EB: Search results should be displayed when searching via Package view selection and dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Right-click on a package.
3. Select the 'Search' option from the context menu.
4. Enter a search term in the search dialog.
5. Click the 'Search' button.

Expected behavior: Search results should be displayed.

Notes: In the case of searching for declarations in Java, the search should first try to retrieve the Java element. If that fails, the search should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
